reasoning.correctness: Generated Answer correctly identifies the condition as 'cardiac ischemic pictures' matching Gold [D-36]. It accurately notes tightness rather than pain/out-of-breathness [D-36, P-1/P-5], and absence of pain and exertional SOB [D-36]. Minor discrepancy: misphrases 'tightness rather than out-of-breathness' (doctor said not out of breath, more tightness), and attributes SOB absence primarily under absence rather than nature; core facts align without major errors.
reasoning.completeness: Covers: condition (100%), nature of complaints (tightness not pain/SOB [D-36, P-1/P-5]). Misses: specific absences of anxiety/sweaty/impending doom [D-6/P-6], clinician screening [D-5/D-6], nuance of some dyspnea [P-7], patient relief [P-35]. Covers ~85% of key points (strong on condition/nature/absence of pain/SOB, partial on absences).
reasoning.faithfulness: All claims verifiable: condition [D-36], tightness description [P-1], no SOB/pain [D-36], patient reports [P-1/P-5]. Citations accurate to transcript; no hallucinations or unverifiable details.
reasoning.relevance: Directly addresses question by specifying condition and categorizing evidence into nature of chest complaints (tightness vs. SOB) and absences (pain, SOB), with no off-topic content.

summary: The Generated Answer is mostly accurate and relevant, covering core elements of the condition and key symptoms faithfully from the transcript, but misses some specific absent symptoms like anxiety and impending doom cited in the Gold Answer.
